title: Saving All My Love
lyrics:
[intro] (G)
A (G)few stolen (Em7)moments, is (Am7)all that we (D)share
(G)You’ve got your (Em7)family, and (Am7)they need you (D)there
Though I (Em7)try to re(A7)sist, being (Em7)last on your (A7)list
But (G)no o(F#m)ther (Em7)man’s, gonna (F#m)do (B7)
So I’m (Cmaj7)saving (Bm7)all my (Am7)love (D)for (G)you (Em7) (Am7) (D)
 
It’s (G)not very (Em7)easy, li-(Am7)ving all a-(D)lone
My (G)friend try and (Em7)tell me, find a (Am7)man of my (D)own
But (Em7)each time I (A7)try, I just (Em7)break down and (A7)cry
‘Cause I’d (G)rather (F#m)be (Em7)home, feelin’ (F#m)blue (B7)
So I’m (Cmaj7)saving (Bm7)all my (Am7)love (D)for (G)you
 
[bridge]
(F#m) You used to (B7)tell me, we’d (Em7)run away together
(Am7) Love gives you the (D)right, to be (G)free
You (F#)said ‘be patient’, ‘just (B)wait a little longer’
But (Em7)that's just an (A7)old fanta(D)sy
 
I’ve (G)got to get (Em7)ready, just a (Am7)few minutes (D)more
Gonna (G)get an old (Em7)feeling, when you (Am7)walk through that (D)door
‘Cause to-(Em7)night is the (A7)night, when I’m (Em7)feeling all (A7)right
We’ll be (G)making (F#m)love the (Em7)whole night (F#m)through (B7)
So I’m (Cmaj7)saving (Bm7)all my (Am7)love
Yes, I’m (Cmaj7)saving (Bm7)all my (Am7)love
Yes, I’m (Cmaj7)saving (Bm7)all my (Am7)love (D)for (G)you (Em7) (Am7) (D)
 
(G)No other (Em7)woman, is (Am7)gonna love you (D)more
‘Cause to-(Em7)night, is the (A7)night, when I’m (Em7)feeling all (A7)right
We´ll be (G)making (F#m)love the (Em7)whole night (F#m)through (B7)
So I’m (Cmaj7)saving (Bm7)all my (Am7)love
Yes I’m (Cmaj7)saving (Bm7)all my (Am7)lovin
Yes I’m (Cmaj7)saving (Bm7)all my (Am7)love (D)for (G)you (Em7) (Am7) (D)
For (G)you (Em7) (Am7) (D)
For (G)you [end]
